title: Cyber comms 101 - What to say when cyber hits the fan
synopsis: Learn how to communicate about cyber incidents without previous communication experience and pick up free templates for various scenarios.

speakers.name: Helinä Turunen
speakers.bio: Helinä wields the power of words in cyber. Their experience includes a plethora of things from both private and public sectors - From coordinating zero day vulnerability warnings, giving media interviews on latest cyber phenomena and herding cyber alpacas at the NCSC-FI to leading phishing training experts at Hoxhunt. They are also a mentor and an artist.
